# Bloodlust

[![Play Now](https://img.shields.io/badge/Play%20Now-181717.svg?logo=github)](https://fydar.github.io/GlobalGameJam2022/)\
[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Global%20Game%20Jam-2022-181717.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/bloodlust-5)

Interactable visual novel in a beutiful world.

![Snoot Cover](./img/Screenshot%2001-31-2022%2003-52-15.png)

**Global Game Jam 2022**\
**Theme**: "Duality"

![Snoot Cover](./img/Screenshot%2001-30-2022%2017-29-16.png)
